overview: In the warehouse of the Korea Democracy Foundation, a bundle of mysterious old roll films written "Film damaged by the flood" is found. In attempts of restoring it, they visit the groups of photographers who recorded the field at the time and try following the traces of the roll film. However, as that world is restored and damaged photos are brought back, deleted worlds are discovered. The world of the many workers who fought to prevent the hell created by the protagonists of the democratization movement after they became president. In the midst of the alternateness, the landscape is gradually revealed.
title: Melting Icecream
